pages.text: This augment can only be added to the $(l:modules/dropper)Dropper/$ and $(l:modules/flinger)Flinger/$ modules.$(p)It can be stacked; each augment added will increase the pickup delay on dropped/flung items by 10 ticks (0.5 sec). This can be useful if you don't want players accidentally picking up nearby dropped items, for example.
